, TAT_AGGR_CVSN_TXTN_STD_SUM , TAT_AGGR_CVSN_CALC_TX_AMNT , TAT_AGGR_YR_AVG_CALC_TX_AMNT , TAT_AGGR_CALC_TX_AMNT , TAT_AGGR_ALPAY_TX_AMNT , TAT_AGGR_REGRST_TGT_TX_AMNT , PYMT_REG_TGT_INCM_TX_QNTY , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR=#calcSevePayPsnBlggYr# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , DEPT_CD , HAN_NM , RESN_REGN_NUM , AIMENR_ECTE_YN , FRGNR_DIV_CD , RIDN_SEPT_YN , RIDN_CD , RIDN_NM , BLGG_YR_BGNN_DT , BLGG_YR_END_DT , RETRY_REAS_CD , BUSOPR_RGSTN_NUM , PAE_WORK_NM , RETRY_PAY_QNTY , FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY , TXTN_TGT_RETRY_PAY_QNTY , ICNC_DT , RKFCD_DT , RSGTN_DT , PYMT_DT , LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM , EEPN_MNTH_ICM , ADD_MNTH_ICM , DUP_MNTH_ICM , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM , LOG_PPNL_12BEF_ICNC_DT , LOG_PPNL_12BEF_RKFCD_DT , LOG_PPNL_12BEF_RSGTN_DT , LOG_PPNL_12BEF_PYMT_DT , LOG_PPNL_12BEF_LOG_MNTH_ICM , LOG_PPNL_12BEF_EEPN_MNTH_ICM , LOG_PPNL_12BEF_ADD_MNTH_ICM , LOG_PPNL_12BEF_DUP_MNTH_ICM , LOG_PPNL_12BEF_LOG_YR_NUM , LOG_PPNL_13AFR_ICNC_DT , LOG_PPNL_13AFR_RKFCD_DT , LOG_PPNL_13AFR_RSGTN_DT , LOG_PPNL_13AFR_PYMT_DT , LOG_PPNL_13AFR_LOG_MNTH_ICM , LOG_PPNL_13AFR_EEPN_MNTH_ICM , LOG_PPNL_13AFR_ADD_MNTH_ICM , LOG_PPNL_13AFR_DUP_MNTH_ICM , LOG_PPNL_13AFR_LOG_SVC , RETRY_INCM_PYMT_SUM , RETRY_INCM_FXRT_DDUC_SUM , LOG_YR_DDUC_SUM , RETRY_TXTN_STD_CLUT_SUM , TAT_12BEF_TXTN_STD_PPNL_SUM , TAT_12BEF_YRAVG_TXSTD_SUM , TAT_12BEF_CVSN_TXTN_STD_SUM , TAT_12BEF_CVSN_CALC_AMNT , TAT_12BEF_YR_AVG_CALC_AMNT , TAT_12BEF_CALC_TX_AMNT , TAT_12BEF_ALPAY_TX_AMNT , TAT_12BEF_REG_TGT_TX_AMNT , TAT_13AFR_TXSTD_PPNL_SUM , TAT_13AFR_YR_AVG_STD_SUM , TAT_13AFR_CVSN_TXTN_STD_SUM , TAT_13AFR_CVSN_CALC_TX_AMNT , TAT_13AFR_YR_AVG_CALC_AMNT , TAT_13AFR_ALPAY_TX_AMNT , TAT_13AFR_REGRST_TGT_SUM , TAT_AGGR_TXTN_STD_PPNL_SUM , TAT_AGGR_YR_AVG_TXTN_STD_SUM , TAT_AGGR_CVSN_TXTN_STD_SUM , TAT_AGGR_CVSN_CALC_TX_AMNT , TAT_AGGR_YR_AVG_CALC_TX_AMNT , TAT_AGGR_CALC_TX_AMNT , TAT_AGGR_ALPAY_TX_AMNT , TAT_AGGR_REGRST_TGT_TX_AMNT , PYMT_REG_TGT_INCM_TX_QNTY , PYMT_REG_TGT_RGON_INCM_QNTY , PYMT_REG_TGT_FARVIL_SPCL_QNTY , PYMT_REGRST_TGT_AGGR_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM REMT2400 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR DESC , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM REMT2400 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
